go_data.justification: CDT1 assembles at replication origins, forming pre-replicative complexes (pre-RCs) during the G1-phase of the cell cycle.
CDT1 is a component of pre-replicative complexes (pre-RCs) that assemble at replication origins.
CDT1 interacts with other pre-RC components, such as ORC complex and CDC6.
CDT1 is involved in DNA replication and is expected to be located in the nucleus.
